reviews.review: Jogo full divertido apesar dos killers tryhard
Muy buen juego, divertido con amigos, aunque tenga bugs y lag.
It's been described to me as a game you hate and love at the same time. I personally really enjoy playing it. Like most online games the people you play with can be make or break for the rounds...
Un juego para pasar buenos ratos con los colegas o si estas solo para hac√©rselo pasar mal a la gente....

This game was fun. Now it is very unfun :/ same killers every match. Sometimes you get surivors with 10 hours, sometimes 3000 hours. Boon totems are a problem and is really screwing the game over. The devs wont realise the problems of this game. You have to run meta or else you'll lose 8/10 of the times.
This game is worth the depression you will get

Gran juego multijugador. Mec√°nicas muy pulidas y perfecto tanto para casuales como para el competitivo. Mi √∫nica queja es la absurda cantidad de dlc's, y la gran ventaja q tienen los q los compran. A√∫n as√≠ lo recomiendo y mucho m√°s si esta en descuento

game wont even start i tried to open it 3 times for like 10 mins  the blue bar loads in and when its finished nothing happens

my pc: rtx 3070 16 gb ram,ryzen 5 5600x.
it's hella fun when you play with your friends... well if only your friends like each other...

Its a very fun and challenging survival game. Its best played with a few friends because some solo queue teammates make you question their brain function, but if you don't have friends to play with just tell yourself "Its fine that my teammates are stupid" and you should be okay lol.
once you hit 100 hours quit immediately

al principio todo muy bien,jiji jaja todo fantastico y gracioso,de surperviviente no se porque no juego pero para jugar de killer mejor cortate los huevos y pasaras mas gusto que jugando a este juego,en el momento en el que comienzas a subir 1 de los killers o ganas 2 partidas ya te meten en el saco de la comunidad toxica y de mierda que tiene este juego,solo juegas contra ranks altos y no puedes hacer nada como killer te hacen los motores en menos de 3 minutos, te ciegas con las linternas desde cualquier lado,pueden tankear infinito y bueno ya cuando te acaban de hacer el ultimo generador pues nada a aguantar a 4 monos que te hacen teabag y spamean EZ en el chat como idiotas.    
en resumen...no se... buen juego comunidad de mierda :D
matchmaking is more fd up than all the kids born nine months after an Alabama  family reunion
polecam magda gesler i jest fajna wiec polecam fajnie zabija sie male dzieci huntreska rzucajac w nie toporkami

With the amount of hours I spent playing this game, I have come to a conclusion...

...This games sucks...

...Don't play it...

...Please.

Wish it played like it used to. Devs are more interested in cash grabs and NFT's then balance or listening to the community. Don't let any good will fool you. They dont care. Big data and excuses and blindness drove this into the ground and they wont change now. 
Its a shame.
i have only three words to say - mikaela's dump truck. that's it, that's all you need to know. get this game asap

The Good
+Loads of cool killer licenses and unique killers
+Varied Survivors
+Active Player Base
The Bad
-Only 1 game mode (fix those generators again ZZzzzzzzzzzzzzzz)
-Limited game mechanics
How to make the game good
More game modes and more mechanics 
Have these game mode ideas for free
+Killer vs Killer vs more Survivors (highest kill count wins)
+Capture the Killer Mode
+Survive the night without a generator in sight

TL;DR:  If you like hockey you'll LOVE Dead By Daylight!!!

I have thousands of hours on PS4 with literally EVERY SINGLE purchasable thing owned all the way up to Deathslinger on there.  Switched to PC.  Still playing but I refuse to spend money for the same thing twice...  Why?  Cause that would literally turn this into a drug habit.  

This game is so incredibly addictive and a fair 70% of the community is the most toxic and vile type of gamer you'll meet.  From Fortnite children to incels to the types of folk that will get a cosmetic taken away because they were using it to push their backwoods views of bigotry....  God this game is awful most days.

But the highs are SO HIGH.  For the 30% of the player base that loves to game and strategize and pull off incredible plays for the pure endorphin rush - There's no better game on the market.

BHVR - the dealer in this case...  They've been so out of touch with the community for a LONG time now.  I feel like they realized that when they do their job poorly and get meme'd into the ground over it, it keeps the buzz about the game going  strong and the controversy is honestly the only thing they have to thank for their success at this point.
najlepsze uczucie w tej grze jest gdy grasz koreanczykiem lub huntreska otwierasz szafke po noze lub toporki a tam siedzi surv. polecam
Yes, is good if you enjoy dying constantly and a game that seems to be half pay to win. It is a gme I personally just dont enjoy, but nothing wrong with it as an actual games.
